button._pay.comment: The text in the button, which is used to pay the order.
button._continuePay.comment: The text in the button, which is used to continue to pay the order.
button._checkDetail.comment: The text in the button, which is used to check the details of the order.
button._query.comment: The text in the button, which is used to query the order.
button._finish.comment: The text in the button, which is used to manually complete the order.
button._update.comment: The text in the button, which is used to update the order.

field._amount.comment: The credits amount of the order.
field._price.comment: The credits amount of the order.
field._createdAt.comment: The creation time of the order.
field._payWay.comment: The payment method of the order.
field._api.comment: The API is a kind of the online service.
field._proxy.comment: The Proxy is a kind of the online service, which means the HTTP Proxy used for transferring the data.

message._paidSuccessfully.comment: The message of the successful payment.
message._createFailed.comment: The message of the failed creation.
message.wechatPayHelp: Please open WeChat on your phone, scan to complete the payment
message._wechatPayHelp.comment: The message of the WeChat payment help.
message._free.comment: The message of the free order.
message.buyInExternalUrl: Please complete the payment in the external link
message._buyInExternalUrl.comment: The message of the external link payment.
message._updateFailed.comment: The message of the failed update.
message._updateSuccessfully.comment: The message of the successful update.
message.confirmFinish: This operation will manually set the order to the payment status and complete the distribution processing, which cannot be undone. Please confirm that the customer has completed the payment, do you want to continue?
message._confirmFinish.comment: The message of the confirm finish.

state._pending.comment: The status of the order, which means this order is still pending user's payment.
state._paid.comment: The status of the order, which means this order has been paid.
state._expired.comment: The status of the order, which means this order has been expired.
state._failed.comment: The status of the order, which means this order has been failed.

title._info.comment: The title which used show as a title of website, means the order information.
title._wechatPay.comment: The title which used show as a title of website, means the WeChat payment.
title._aliPay.comment: The title which used show as a title of website, means the Alipay payment, Alipay payment is a kind of the online payment.
title._stripe.comment: The title which used show as a title of website, means the Stripe payment, Stripe payment is a kind of the online payment.
title._manageOrder.comment: The title which used show as a title of website, means the manage order.
